ðŸ“– Summary: Presenton is an open-source AI presentation generator and API that allows users to create presentations locally using models like OpenAI and Gemini, or their own hosted models. It offers features like custom templates, AI template generation from existing PowerPoint files, flexible generation from prompts or documents, and export to PPTX and PDF formats.
